about.title: About the Company
about.description: TradesAdvisor is a fintech company that brings together the expertise of traders, analysts, and programmers. We create tools for those seeking precision, flexibility, and automation in financial markets.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a team of traders, analysts, and developers who use machine learning and algorithms to identify market opportunities.

tech.title: Our Technologies
tech.description: We do not try to predict the marketâ€”we model its behavior based on objective data, statistical methods, and algorithmic analysis. Our goal is to provide users with structured information and tools for making independent decisions in a rapidly changing market environment.

philosophy.slogan: We don't guess the marketâ€”we model it

empowerment.title: Client Empowerment
points: Our goal is to provide you with the best ideas and a systematic approach, while you make the decisions.
You manage the accountâ€”we provide analytical scenarios based on models and statistics.

approach.title: Our Approach
points: All ideas are based on years of experience in trading, investments, machine learning, and market statistics.
You can cancel the service at any timeâ€”we offer a proven path.

control.we: We provide data, models, and calculations.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.description: Our services are not provided to U.S. citizens, residents, or persons located in the U.S. By accessing this site or using our services, you confirm that you are not a 'U.S. person' as defined by Regulation S of the Securities Act of 1933.

subscription.note: All plans include 24/7 support and the ability to cancel anytime.

note.title: Important Information
note.content: Legal Disclaimer: TradesAdvisor Holdings LLC is not a registered investment advisor (RIA), broker-dealer, financial analyst, brokerage firm, or investment company. All provided information, including opinions, strategies, analytical data, and tools, is for educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute personalized investment advice. Users make all investment decisions independently and bear full responsibility for any risks and consequences. It is recommended to consult a licensed financial advisor before making investment decisions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services

q1.question: Do you provide investment management or discretionary trading?
q1.answer: No, we only provide consulting services. All trading decisions and operations are made by the client.

q2.question: How do you charge for your services?
q2.answer: Our fee structure is performance-based and disclosed individually in the consulting agreement. We do not charge asset management fees and do not have access to client funds.

q3.question: Where are the funds held?
q3.answer: All client funds remain in the client's brokerage accounts; we have no access or control.
